snippet: The fortunes of the Ottawa Senators may have taken a drastic turn for the worse this week when they lost Erik Karlsson, their 22-year-old All-Star defenseman, for the season with a lacerated Achilles' tendon.
abstract: The fortunes of the Ottawa Senators may have taken a drastic turn for the worse this week when they lost Erik Karlsson, their 22-year-old All-Star defenseman, for the season with a lacerated Achilles' tendon.

byline.original: By JEFF Z. KLEIN and STU HACKEL

headline.main: Injury to Senators' Star Puts Spotlight Back on Penguins' Cooke
